characters.name: Schoolboy Shoma
characters.description: A talented high school baseball player who uses his bat and physical prowess in combat.

characters.name: Test Boss
characters.description: A powerful boss created for testing new characters and abilities.

characters.name: Shao Kahn
characters.description: The Emperor of Outworld, a powerful warrior with unrivaled strength. His hammer strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies.

characters.name: Cham Cham
characters.description: A wild fighter who grows stronger with each attack, wielding a deadly boomerang.

characters.name: Ayane
characters.description: A swift assassin who uses teleportation and shadow techniques. Her Combat Reflexes passive lets her reduce ability cooldowns.

characters.name: Farmer Nina
characters.description: A precision sniper with enhanced buff capabilities. Her Amplified Buffs passive doubles the power of all buffs applied to her.

characters.name: Atlantean Kagome
characters.description: A mystical archer from Atlantis whose arrows are imbued with ancient magic. Her Atlantean Blessing passive converts missing mana into healing.

characters.name: Farmer Alice
characters.description: A bulky tank with magical resistance. Her Magical Resistance passive allows her to gain permanent Magic Shield when taking magical damage.

characters.name: Farmer Shoma
characters.description: A farm-raised baseball prodigy with extraordinary critical hit chance. His Farming Experience passive increases his already high crit chance after turn 20.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Kokoro
characters.description: A healer who specializes in restorative abilities. Her Healing Feedback passive lets her recover health whenever she uses any ability.

characters.name: Schoolboy Siegfried
characters.description: A determined schoolboy warrior who grows stronger with every boon. His passive grants bonus Physical Damage per active buff.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Julia
characters.description: A energetic fighter who grows stronger whenever she heals or is healed. Her passive grants permanent Physical Damage on healing.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Ayane
characters.description: A swift assassin who uses agility and daggers. Her Combat Reflexes passive boosts her damage after dodging.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Elphelt
characters.description: A cheerful shooter who bolsters her defenses when using abilities.

characters.name: Blazing Elemental
characters.description: A fiery being that unleashes explosive power, harming foes and healing allies.

characters.name: Infernal Birdie
characters.description: A relentless warrior wielding enchanted chains, capable of striking multiple foes and stunning them.
